title: instructions?
body: I've had `sonda` configured in my SvelteKit application for weeks and I've read every page in the docs multiple times _(even did it again today as a sanity check)_, and I can't find any mention of how one is meant to generate a report once everything is configured.
author: braebo

comments.body: Good point, I will update the docs. Once you've added a plugin to the configuration, running the `build` command should both build your application and generate a report.
I've updated the docs to mention that the report is generated whenever the project is built.
